testcase.classname: Automated QoD Crisp System Integration Test
testcase.name: Create QoD session, get QoD session and delete QoD Session

testcase.classname: Automated QoD Crisp System Integration Test
testcase.name: Get a QoD session for an unknown / expired session id
testcase.system-out: Given Use the BaseURL.......................................................passed When Create a new QoD session for an unknown or expired session id..........passed Then Response code is 404...................................................passed Then Response in message is QoD session not found...........................passed

testcase.classname: Automated QoD Crisp System Integration Test
testcase.name: QoD session for an invalid payload
testcase.system-out: Given Use the BaseURL.......................................................passed When Create a new QoD session with missing double quote in json payload.....passed Then Response code is 400...................................................passed When Create a new QoD session with missing bracket in json payload..........passed When Create a new QoD session with incorrect msisdn in json payload.........passed When Create a new QoD session with incorrect ipaddress in json payload......passed When Create a new QoD session with missing "qos" in json payload............passed
